sect1.title: Native Born
sect1.subtitle: They are the unIdercurrents or the undertow.
sect1.para: Skilled craftsman and magic workers. All close to the land but not shamanistic. In a way they are a race of craftpeople
Small and dark like mexican peasants. Resistant to the cold.

sect1.title: Merovan
sect1.subtitle: Camelot with a sinister twist
sect1.para: Norman Knights and men at Arms (Chain, Plate and Leather, Long Swords and Bastard Swords, Spears and Pole Arms, Xbows rather then Self Bows) French speaking. with a large native born population slowly melding in.

Ducal fiefdoms with bordering Marchers. The Arch Dukes have the population and the wealth while the Marches have the arms and the pride. Their only real common ground is the king. The king is from a small neglected branch of one of the Ducal families (Almost Native is the phrase....). Hairochan advised and trained and guarded. Unerneath it all is the Native Born.
Temples to the Lord and Lady. Adsum Domine . Adsum Maria

sect1.title: Kothan
sect1.subtitle: Where all the woemn are strong and the men are good looking.
sect1.para: Norse and Angle with Saxon common law.
Axe Thanes, Spear Maidens, Bow Maidens
Shamans ( The forest spirits and the dead asmong of, and the creatures).
Thanest - Leader of the Thanes and War Maidens (Could be male or female)

row.entry: Otin (Wiseman, Judge, Player of the Great Games)

sect1.title: Thenean
sect1.subtitle: Venetian trader houses "its a Clan eat Clan world"

sect1.title: Bitadari
sect1.subtitle: The Bitadar are bright and terrifying, dark and terrifying, or just terrifying

sect1.title: Uru
sect1.subtitle: Hard partying Rastarafarian earth mages. They are lovers , not fighters. " The Canon is my word, the order is my deed, and theÂ single intent is my state "

sect1.title: Takeda
sect1.subtitle: No mind, No sword. Know mind, No-Sword
